headline: Lockheed Martin Expands Autonomy And Missile Defense Capacity As Orders Build
summary: Lockheed Martin (NYSE:LMT) has introduced its Lamprey Multi-Mission Autonomous Undersea Vehicle, expanding its unmanned naval systems offering. The company has signed a framework agreement that targets a fourfold increase in THAAD missile interceptor production. Lockheed Martin is breaking ground on a new advanced manufacturing site, the Munitions Acceleration Center, to support higher output. For you as an investor, these moves sit at the intersection of defense technology and long cycle...

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Lockheed Martin (LMT) After Its Strong Share Price Rally?
summary: If you are wondering whether Lockheed Martin's share price still reflects good value after a strong run, this article walks through what the numbers actually say about the stock. Lockheed Martin's share price last closed at US$628.70, with returns of 4.3% over 7 days, 14.1% over 30 days, 26.5% year to date and 46.4% over 1 year, plus 42.0% over 3 years and 114.0% over 5 years. Recent headlines around major defense contracts, shifting geopolitical tensions and ongoing demand for military...
